body:
Plate cells at ~25% confluency in 24-wells plates, using standard growth medium.





Day2:
Check cells confluency \(it shoud be ~50%) and replace the medium with 500μl of growth medium without antibiotics.
Mix 600 ng  of siRNA in 50ul of Opti-MEM \(amounts and volumes used for a single well)
Mix 1 ul of RNAiMAX in 50 μl of Opti-MEM
Combine the 2 solutions, mix gently and incubate 10 minutes at room temperature
Add the solution uniformly to the cells
After 4-6 hours replace medium with standard growth medium

Incubate cells for 48 hours under standard conditions.





Day4:
Replace the medium with 500ul of growth medium without antibiotics
Mix 600ng  of miRNA, 80ng of reporter plasmid and 40ng of pCS2-lacZ plasmid in 50ul of Opti-MEM \(amounts and volumes used for a single well; pCS2-lacZ is used as normalizer for luciferase assays)
Mix 1ul of Lipofectamine2000 in 50μl of Opti-MEM
Combine the 2 solutions, mix gently and incubate 10 minutes at room temperature

After 4-6 hours replace medium with standard growth medium





Day5:
Replace the medium with 500μl of growth medium containing 0.1% serum and incubate for 8 hours
Dilute the protein ligand in 0.1% serum medium and add the solution to the cells
Incubate cells under standard conditions for 2-16 hours \(according to the ligand activity)
Replace medium with 200μl per well of luciferase lysis buffer
